mn41:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena sala nama kosalanam brahmanagamo tadavasari.
mn41:2.2: “samano khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim salam anuppatto.
mn41:2.3: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn41:2.4: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’.
mn41:2.5: So imam lokam sadevakam samarakam sabrahmakam sassamanabrahmanim pajam sadevamanussam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti.
mn41:2.6: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam;
mn41:2.8: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
mn41:3.1: Atha kho saleyyaka brahmanagahapatika yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva appekacce bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu; appekacce bhagavata saddhim sammodimsu, sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu; appekacce yena bhagava tenanjalim panametva ekamantam nisidimsu; appekacce bhagavato santike namagottam savetva ekamantam nisidimsu; appekacce tunhibhuta ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho saleyyaka brahmanagahapatika bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn41:4.1: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti?
mn41:4.2: Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti?
mn41:5.1: “Adhammacariyavisamacariyahetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
mn41:5.2: Dhammacariyasamacariyahetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti”ti.
mn41:6.1: “Na kho mayam imassa bhoto gotamassa sankhittena bhasitassa, vittharena attham avibhattassa, vittharena attham ajanama.
mn41:6.2: Sadhu no bhavam gotamo tatha dhammam desetu, yatha mayam imassa bhoto gotamassa sankhittena bhasitassa, vittharena attham avibhattassa, vittharena attham ajaneyyama”ti.
mn41:6.3: “Tena hi, gahapatayo, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn41:6.4: “Evam, bho”ti kho saleyyaka brahmanagahapatika bhagavato paccassosum.
mn41:7.1: “Tividham kho, gahapatayo, kayena adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti, catubbidham vacaya adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti, tividham manasa adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti.
mn41:8.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, tividham kayena adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti?
mn41:8.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco panatipati hoti, luddo lohitapani hatappahate nivittho adayapanno panabhutesu.
mn41:8.3: Adinnadayi kho pana hoti. Yam tam parassa paravittupakaranam, gamagatam va arannagatam va, tam adinnam theyyasankhatam adata hoti.
mn41:8.4: Kamesumicchacari kho pana hoti. Ya ta maturakkhita piturakkhita matapiturakkhita bhaturakkhita bhaginirakkhita natirakkhita gottarakkhita dhammarakkhita sassamika saparidanda antamaso malagulaparikkhittapi, tatharupasu carittam apajjita hoti.
mn41:8.5: Evam kho, gahapatayo, tividham kayena adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti.
mn41:9.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, catubbidham vacaya adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti?
mn41:9.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco musavadi hoti. Sabhagato va parisagato va, natimajjhagato va pugamajjhagato va rajakulamajjhagato va, abhinito sakkhiputtho: ‘ehambho purisa, yam janasi tam vadehi’ti, so ajanam va aha: ‘janami’ti, janam va aha: na janami’ti, ‘apassam va aha: ‘passami’ti, passam va aha: ‘na passami’ti. Iti attahetu va parahetu va amisakincikkhahetu va sampajanamusa bhasita hoti.
mn41:9.3: Pisunavaco kho pana hoti. Ito sutva amutra akkhata imesam bhedaya, amutra va sutva imesam akkhata amusam bhedaya. Iti samagganam va bhetta, bhinnanam va anuppadata, vaggaramo vaggarato vagganandi vaggakaranim vacam bhasita hoti.
mn41:9.4: Pharusavaco kho pana hoti. Ya sa vaca andaka kakkasa parakatuka parabhisajjani kodhasamanta asamadhisamvattanika, tatharupim vacam bhasita hoti.
mn41:9.5: Samphappalapi kho pana hoti. Akalavadi abhutavadi anatthavadi adhammavadi avinayavadi. Anidhanavatim vacam bhasita hoti akalena anapadesam apariyantavatim anatthasamhitam.
mn41:9.6: Evam kho, gahapatayo, catubbidham vacaya adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti.
mn41:10.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, tividham manasa adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti?
mn41:10.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco abhijjhalu hoti, yam tam parassa paravittupakaranam tam abhijjhata hoti: ‘aho vata yam parassa tam mamassa’ti.
mn41:10.3: Byapannacitto kho pana hoti padutthamanasankappo: ‘ime satta hannantu va vajjhantu va ucchijjantu va vinassantu va ma va ahesun’ti.
mn41:10.5: ‘natthi dinnam natthi yittham natthi hutam, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, natthi ayam loko natthi paro loko, natthi mata natthi pita, natthi satta opapatika, natthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
mn41:10.6: Evam kho, gahapatayo, tividham manasa adhammacariyavisamacariya hoti.
mn41:10.7: Evam adhammacariyavisamacariyahetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
mn41:11.1: Tividham kho, gahapatayo, kayena dhammacariyasamacariya hoti, catubbidham vacaya dhammacariyasamacariya hoti, tividham manasa dhammacariyasamacariya hoti.
mn41:12.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, tividham kayena dhammacariyasamacariya hoti?
mn41:12.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato hoti, nihitadando nihitasattho lajji dayapanno sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharati.
mn41:12.3: Adinnadanam pahaya adinnadana pativirato hoti. Yam tam parassa paravittupakaranam, gamagatam va arannagatam va, tam nadinnam theyyasankhatam adata hoti.
mn41:12.4: Kamesumicchacaram pahaya kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti. Ya ta maturakkhita piturakkhita matapiturakkhita bhaturakkhita bhaginirakkhita natirakkhita gottarakkhita dhammarakkhita sassamika saparidanda antamaso malagulaparikkhittapi, tatharupasu na carittam apajjita hoti.
mn41:12.5: Evam kho, gahapatayo, tividham kayena dhammacariyasamacariya hoti.
mn41:13.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, catubbidham vacaya dhammacariyasamacariya hoti?
mn41:13.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco musavadam pahaya musavada pativirato hoti. Sabhagato va parisagato va, natimajjhagato va pugamajjhagato va rajakulamajjhagato va, abhinito sakkhiputtho: ‘ehambho purisa, yam janasi tam vadehi’ti, so ajanam va aha: ‘na janami’ti, janam va aha: ‘janami’ti, apassam va aha: ‘na passami’ti, passam va aha: ‘passami’ti. Iti attahetu va parahetu va amisakincikkhahetu va na sampajanamusa bhasita hoti.
mn41:13.3: Pisunam vacam pahaya pisunaya vacaya pativirato hoti, ito sutva na amutra akkhata imesam bhedaya, amutra va sutva na imesam akkhata amusam bhedaya. Iti bhinnanam va sandhata, sahitanam va anuppadata, samaggaramo samaggarato samagganandi samaggakaranim vacam bhasita hoti.
mn41:13.4: Pharusam vacam pahaya pharusaya vacaya pativirato hoti. Ya sa vaca nela kannasukha pemaniya hadayangama pori bahujanakanta bahujanamanapa—tatharupim vacam bhasita hoti.
mn41:13.5: Samphappalapam pahaya samphappalapa pativirato hoti. Kalavadi bhutavadi atthavadi dhammavadi vinayavadi nidhanavatim vacam bhasita hoti kalena sapadesam pariyantavatim atthasamhitam.
mn41:13.6: Evam kho, gahapatayo, catubbidham vacaya dhammacariyasamacariya hoti.
mn41:14.1: Kathanca, gahapatayo, tividham manasa dhammacariyasamacariya hoti?
mn41:14.2: Idha, gahapatayo, ekacco anabhijjhalu hoti, yam tam parassa paravittupakaranam tam nabhijjhata hoti: ‘aho vata yam parassa tam mamassa’ti.
mn41:14.3: Abyapannacitto kho pana hoti appadutthamanasankappo: ‘ime satta avera abyabajjha anigha sukhi attanam pariharantu’ti.
mn41:14.5: ‘atthi dinnam atthi yittham atthi hutam, atthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, atthi ayam loko atthi paro loko, atthi mata atthi pita, atthi satta opapatika, atthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
mn41:14.6: Evam kho, gahapatayo, tividham manasa dhammacariyasamacariya hoti.
mn41:14.7: Evam dhammacariyasamacariyahetu kho, gahapatayo, evam’idhekacce satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti.
mn41:15.2: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana khattiyamahasalanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn41:15.3: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana khattiyamahasalanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn41:16-17.2: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana brahmanamahasalanam …pe…
mn41:16-17.4: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana gahapatimahasalanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn41:18-42.2: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn41:18-42.3: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn41:18-42.7: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana tavatimsanam devanam …pe…
mn41:18-42.13: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana brahmakayikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn41:18-42.17: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana abhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti;
mn41:18-42.18: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana abhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn41:18-42.22: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana parittabhanam devanam …pe…
mn41:18-42.38: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so kayassa bheda param marana nevasannanasannayatanupaganam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
mn41:43.2: ‘aho vataham asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyyan’ti;
mn41:43.3: thanam kho panetam vijjati, yam so asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyya.
mn41:44.1: Evam vutte, saleyyaka brahmanagahapatika bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn41:44.3: Seyyathapi, bho gotama, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhota gotamena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
mn41:44.4: Ete mayam bhavantam gotamam saranam gacchama dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
mn41:44.5: Upasake no bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupete saranam gate”ti.
